comment: Variation on ~ lgsdi valid for all ` M , N ` but only for positive ` A ` . (The exact location of the failure of this law is for ` A = -u 1 ` , ` M = 0 ` , and some ` N ` in which case ` ( -u 1 /L 0 ) = 1 ` but ` ( -u 1 /L N ) = -u 1 ` when ` -u 1 ` is not a quadratic residue mod ` N ` .)
